headline: Mohawk Industries (MHK) Q3 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Mohawk Industries (MHK) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Mohawk Industries (MHK) Q3 Earnings Miss Estimates
summary: Mohawk Industries (MHK) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -0.37% and +1.13%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Mohawk Industries (NYSE:MHK) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q3
summary: Flooring manufacturer Mohawk Industries (NYSE:MHK) reported revenue ahead of Wall Street’s expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 1.4% year on year to $2.76 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.67 per share was 1.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Mohawk Industries: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MHK) on Thursday reported third-quarter profit of $108.8 million. On a per-share basis, the Calhoun, Georgia-based company said it had profit of $1.75. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $2.67 per share.

headline: Mohawk Industries Reports Q3 2025 Results
summary: CALHOUN, Ga., Oct. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mohawk Industries, Inc. (NYSE: MHK) today announced third quarter 2025 net earnings of $109 million and earnings per share (“EPS”) of $1.75; adjusted net earnings were $167 million, and adjusted EPS was $2.67. Net sales for the third quarter of 2025 were $2.8 billion, up 1.4% as reported and essentially flat on an adjusted basis versus the prior year.
